pr_title: Fix getting live application routes on bg-deploy

timeline.bodyText:
As we talked, this could break the new suffixes scenario for the new bg-deploy process.
A new mechanism should be introduced which to provide the information about the deployedMtaColor but in the same time to be hidden and easily estendible. Think in this way.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: If you apply the below comment, you could get rid of the Live word in the class name.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Rename to isModuleNameMatching
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Could we check whether !deployedModules.isEmpty() ?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText:
The naming of the method is not applicable for two reasons:

You bring the App notation here although you were talking for modules all above
It is not correct in the syntax --> hasApplicationNameContainLiveDeployedColor...
Think of a new method name and take in mind the comments at the begining of the class.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Same here - refactor
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Now, if you decide that you want to fix the first two comments(at the begining of the class), you should also think of a way how these checks could be done in more abstract way - think of it.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText:
The ApplicationCloudModelBuilder is complex enough without adding addition Live notation in it.
However, if you think of a good way how to achieve the comments in the DeployedLiveModuleCalculator.java file, you would remove this Live notation and there will be no problem.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Is there some case when deployedModules.get(0) will be reached?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Can this deployedLiveModuleCalculator be null? If yes, when and why?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need map here(expectedLiveDeployedModuleName), only the module names?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Why this is removed from here?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: It was moved from cf.process in cf.core package because the constant couldn't be used from classes in cf.core package.
replies.author: theghost5800

timeline.bodyText: This should be in a separate commit, because it addresses a different issue.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.message:
Fix getting live application routes on bg-deploy

JIRA:LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1875

timeline.bodyText:
Why are the names being compared in a case-insensitive manner?
What if there are 2 different modules, the names of which only differ in uppercase and lowercase letters?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText:
I am using the same logic from DeployedMta class for find module by name:
public DeployedMtaModule findDeployedModule(String moduleName) {	 return getModules().stream()	 .filter(module -> module.getModuleName()	 .equalsIgnoreCase(moduleName))	 .findFirst()	 .orElse(null);	 }
replies.author: theghost5800

timeline.bodyText:
I don't understand the name of the method
It starts with isAppName, which leads me to believe that you are going to check something about the application name, ok, but then hasLiveDeployedColor is not a grammatically correct way to end the question.
Maybe switch the words around, something like isLiveColorInAppName?
But also, this method is doing 2 things, checking if the name ends with the deployed color and if the name has no suffix. Split it into 2 methods
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText:
Again, the question is grammatically incorrect. If you stick with these words, an alternative is doesAppNameHaveColorWithoutSuffix.
But this method also checks 2 things.
Firstly it checks the 'appName' that it is passed if it doesn't end in either suffix and checks something unrelated to the app name, the deployedMtaColor.
I think the second check should be in a different method
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: If the module name and app name pairs are the only entry in the maps, why not make a nested class for these two things, rather than creating maps each time?
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: Can this module be null?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: Yes, in case when you don't have deployed modules and tested method should return null
replies.author: theghost5800

timeline.bodyText: I think this constant is better here, rather than in the calculator
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: The reason for moving is that DeployedModuleCalculator doesn't have dependency to cf.process package and can't access classes from cf.processes, so the constant should be moved somewhere where it could be accessible from cf.core and cf.processes packages.
replies.author: theghost5800

timeline.bodyText:
Add a builder.
This many arguments is a bit much
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: I tried to use Immutables for builder but it will be need more time to refactor due to inheritence from V3 application cloud model builder.
replies.author: theghost5800

timeline.bodyText: Maybe a better name would be LiveDeployedModuleCalculator
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: The public modifier is redundant in an interface
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText:
The change to DeployedModuleCalculator is good but with the Color suffix, not so much.
My suggestion is name the concrete class something like DeployedModuleCalculatorWithColor
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: doesAppNameHaveColorSuffix
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: doesDeployedModuleContainLiveColor
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: I don't think the amount of uses and length (as an expression) of deployedMta.getModules warrants the need for this method. Just use it normally and delete this
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText: It is nice with boolean but could we make it with enum or?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: typo applicatioN
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Could we rename this method to doesDeployedModuleHaveIdleColor?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText:
Calculator is used for calculating one thing from two or more other things.
Your class is taking one set of modules and it is returning the same set.
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Think of a better naming for this method
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Is this logic extensible?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: Why rename from find to get?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Why is this not configurable? Why can't I pass the DeployedModuleLabel I want?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Rename to ProductizationState.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Redundant prefix.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: The constant name suggests more generic message than the actual message is.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: I need some explanation about this.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: This.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Using a verb for a class name.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: The name of this method does not fit with the class.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Setters should not return values.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.message:
Fix determine of live application color

In case where live and idle application are deployed and live application is not the older one could reflect to
update the live application instead of idle application. This leads to
downtime of productive application.

JIRA:LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1875

timeline.bodyText: Remove Live from the name of the method.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: These are two separate checks. Use two filter() calls in the method above.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Why do we still need this check?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be negated?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need Color at the end of the class name?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: This state is only used in the updateIdleDeployedApplications method. Why not pass it as an argument to the method itself?
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: The name of this method still does not match the name of the class.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.message:
Fix getting live application routes on bg-deploy
